summary: A young woman can't forgive her fiance for getting drunk and rejects him. In an ironic twist of fate, the man she marries becomes an alcoholic.
cast: Nils Aréhn|Josua Bengtson|Bror Berger|Harriet Bosse|Carl Browallius|Tyra Dörum|Emil Fjellström|Mona Geijer-Falkner|Algot Gunnarsson|Eric Gustafson|Gösta Gustafson|Paul Hallström|Tims Halvor|Oscar Johansson|William Larsson|Thyra Leijman-Uppström|Nils Lundell|Wilma Malmlöf|Bertil Malmstedt|Gustav Ranft|Margit Sjöblom|Victor Sjöström|Tora Teje|Anna Thorell|Ruth Weijden|Tor Weijden|Olof Ås
title: Karin Ingmarsdotter
